sections.heading: Definitions.Section 20-206b. - Practice restricted to licensed persons
sections.text: Qualifications. Application and renewal. Fees. Exceptions. Medical referral required. Penalty for practice or use of title by unlicensed person. Penalty for knowing and wilful employment of unlicensed person.Section 20-206c. - D
